v1: Jesus Christ, I think upon Your sacrifice;
You became nothing, poured out to death.
Many times I've wondered at Your gift of life,
and I'm in that place once again.
I'm in that place once again.
v2: Now You are exalted to the highest place,
Soon everyone will bow and confess;
But for now, I marvel at this saving grace,
and I'm full of praise once again.
I'm full of praise once again.
c1: Once again I look upon the cross where You died.
I'm humbled by Your mercy and I'm broken inside.
Once again I thank You, once again I pour out my life.
Thank You for the cross, my Friend.
